entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sachigo Lake

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
